## WorkspaceSvg.isDragging() method

Is the user currently dragging a block or scrolling the flyout/workspace?  True if currently dragging or scrolling.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isDragging(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
